definition: see 消息靈通|消息灵通[xiao1 xi5 ling2 tong1]

sentences.english: Sometimes a lack of information can lead workers to misperceive that there's preferential treatment, says Mr. Reed.
sentences.chinese: 里德说，有时候信息的缺乏会让员工误以为老板偏心。

sentences.english: Finland invested in communications and IT at exactly the right time.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰在通讯和信息技术方面的投资可谓恰逢其时。

sentences.english: The beach life-guards usually flag one another for communication.
sentences.chinese: 海滨救生员通常用旗号传达信息。

sentences.english: She clicks on the link to the registration form and begins entering her information.
sentences.chinese: 她在登记表的连接处点击一下，开始进入她的信息。

sentences.english: The books and journal were informative.
sentences.chinese: 那些书和日记信息量很足。

sentences.english: The development of financial circles and strick precaution of the risk are closely linked with disclosure of financial information.
sentences.chinese: 金融业的发展及其风险的防范与信息披露息息相关。

sentences.english: There is a little bit of information of swine hepatitis E virus in Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 在泰国，有少量关于猪戊型肝炎病毒的信息。

sentences.english: Officials say new information led to the remains at what is believed to be the crash site.
sentences.chinese: 官方人员称新信息领导着剩余的被认为在撞碎的地方。

sentences.english: You can find the information around this hotel from the information card in your room.
sentences.chinese: 有关本饭店的所有信息都在房间的信息卡上。

sentences.english: You can find the information around this hotel from the information card in your room.
sentences.chinese: 有关本饭店的所有信息都在房间的信息卡上。

sentences.english: Set the debug option to enable a backtrace when a; problem occurs.
sentences.chinese: 当有问题出现显示错误信息，便于调试。

sentences.english: When the terminal has an alarm, the terminal will automatically transmit the location information to the management center.
sentences.chinese: 终端出现警情时，终端自动将位置信息传给管理中心。

sentences.english: In an information-based world, power diffusion may pose a bigger danger than power transition.
sentences.chinese: 在信息化世界，权力扩散比权力转移更危险。

sentences.english: Each plug-in has access to information about a personâ ™s current location whereabouts. The location information includes
sentences.chinese: 各插件都可访问关于某人当前位置所在的信息。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在于从不确定传感器数据流中获得更多有用信息。

definition: to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)
